column3: Risk management one pager using country risk the dashboard developed within 48h after the approval
column4: Project manager and appeal manager responsibilities one pager is shared with approval (max 14 days after trigger)
column5: DREF approved within 10 days of the trigger. 14 if the NS has started responding.
column6: Approval by the DREF appeal manager within 24h of receiving the final package

column8: RR personnel Alert sent within 12h of the request
column9: Identification of 1st rotation RR personnel within 48h of the alert
column10: Supply chain plan developed within 1 week of DREF approval
column11: NFI (or emergencies items) being delivered to the country in 3 days since the Requistion
column13: If the country is not MSR, enough resource (HR/ Funds) have been allocated to operate in a Red/ orange security phase areas
